string-array.name: gymquotes
string-array.item: Strong people are harder to kill than weak people and more useful in general
Just remember, somewhere, a little Chinese girl is warming up with your max
Last time I checked, lifting theory has a PR of zero
A champion is someone who gets up when they can’t
The road to nowhere is paved with excuses
Today I will do what others won’t, so tomorrow I can accomplish what others can’t
Do something today that your future self will thank you for
We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence then is not an act but a habit
No matter how slow you go, you are still lapping everybody on the couch
To give anything less than your best is to sacrifice the gift
Life begins at the end of your comfort zone
Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will
